title: How to Draw a Jealous Face

steps.headline: As with any drawing, start with a circle and some guidelines.
Draw out the outline of the face.
steps.description: Usually the chin reaches about 1/2 of a circle below the circle drawn. Then draw the neck, which varies on thickness depending on what kind of character you want to draw.

steps.headline: Add two more guidelines for the hair and the mouth.
Draw the eyes, nose, and bridge.
steps.description: The eyes are extremely important, as they are the first thing people notice on an expression. They should look a little annoyed.

steps.headline: Now the eyebrows and the mouth.
steps.description: Eyebrows shouldn't be very hard to draw, and the mouth can be pouty, closed,or 3/4 open with clenching teeth.

steps.headline: Outline and erase your sketch lines!
steps.description: Add hair, body, and other things as needed first though.

text: As with any drawing, start with a circle and some guidelines.  Draw out the outline of the face. Usually the chin reaches about 1/2 of a circle below the circle drawn. Then draw the neck, which varies on thickness depending on what kind of character you want to draw. Add two more guidelines for the hair and the mouth.  Draw the eyes, nose, and bridge. The eyes are extremely important, as they are the first thing people notice on an expression. They should look a little annoyed. Now the eyebrows and the mouth. Eyebrows shouldn't be very hard to draw, and the mouth can be pouty, closed,or 3/4 open with clenching teeth. Outline and erase your sketch lines! Add hair, body, and other things as needed first though.
